quality_of_application_what_to_improve: Please consider submitting an early application next year. Also make sure the application has been proof-read all of the way through, including the use of capital letters when needed.
quality_of_application_other_reason_deta: We have already received a number of strong applications for Media Studies and unfortunately this was not as strong as some of the others. We have a very limited number of schools able to place this subject (in two Key Stages) so sadly will not be offering an interview on this occassion.
qualifications_other_reason_details: We prefer candidates to have a single degree containing at least 360 credits, with 60 credits at Level 6.
